text: "Never Turn Your Back on Mother Earth" is a 1974 song by Los Angeles band Sparks and is the lead single from their fourth studio album Propaganda. It went to number 13 in the United Kingdom and number 40 in Germany. It did not chart in the United States. It was covered by Depeche Mode in 1987. ==Track listing== # "Never Turn Your Back on Mother Earth" — 2:28 # "Alabamy Right" — 2:11 ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:Sparks (band) songs Category:Depeche Mode songs Category:Glam rock songs Category:Baroque pop songs Category:Art rock songs
